Assembly.description: The Assembly schema defines an assembly.  Assembly information contains details about a device, such as part number, serial number, manufacturer, and production date.  It also provides access to the original data for the assembly.
Assembly.longDescription: This Resource shall represent an assembly for a Redfish implementation.  Assembly information contains details about a device, such as part number, serial number, manufacturer, and production date.  It also provides access to the original data for the assembly.

title: #Assembly.Assembly
